description:
First, Kaede`s school is having a festival, complete with a haunted house! Perhaps Shinobu would make a good addition, but what costume would be the best? A cat-girl? An erotic imp?  Then, Shinobu`s got a new pet - a cute and cuddly 15-foot tall monster p
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Shinobu Disfarçada! / II. Uma Planta Monstro Ficando Selvagem!
Shinobu in Disguise / A Monster Plant Goes Crazy
Shinobu se déguise / La plante monstre devient dingue
Shinobu, Bakeru no Maki / Kaishokubutsu, Abareru no Maki
忍, 化けるの巻 / 怪植物, 暴れるの巻
